partner.name: Réseau de Micro-institutions de Croissance de Revenus (RMCR)

social_performance_strength.name: Anti-Poverty Focus
social_performance_strength.description: The work of most microfinance institutions helps to combat poverty, but these Field Partners do even more.

social_performance_strength.name: Client Voice
social_performance_strength.description: These Field Partners use feedback from the people they serve and adapt their business practices and product offerings to meet their needs.

social_performance_strength.name: Facilitation of Savings
social_performance_strength.description: These Field Partners specifically promote savings as a practice to the people they serve.

social_performance_strength.name: Client Voice
social_performance_strength.description: These Field Partners use feedback from the people they serve and adapt their business practices and product offerings to meet their needs.

social_performance_strength.name: Family and Community Empowerment
social_performance_strength.description: These Field Partners offer support services that address the needs of their clients’ families: their health, education, and/or well-being.

social_performance_strength.name: Entrepreneurial Support
social_performance_strength.description: These Field Partners offer training and support to help people start, manage and grow their businesses.

social_performance_strength.description: These Field Partners offer support services that address the needs of their clients’ families: their health, education, and/or well-being.

partner.name: Maya

social_performance_strength.name: Family and Community Empowerment
social_performance_strength.description: These Field Partners offer support services that address the needs of their clients’ families: their health, education, and/or well-being.

partner.default_rate_note: Maya's delinquency rate often appears higher than the average for Kiva Field Partners. However, this is not because the organization is experiencing an unusually high number of borrowers behind on repayment. To lower the costs of transferring funds, Kiva allows its partners to wait until repayments exceed $5,000 to repay. For small institutions like Maya that have a low outstanding balance with Kiva, this delay sometimes results in higher delinquency rates.

social_performance_strength.description: The work of most microfinance institutions helps to combat poverty, but these Field Partners do even more.

social_performance_strength.name: Family and Community Empowerment
social_performance_strength.description: These Field Partners offer support services that address the needs of their clients’ families: their health, education, and/or well-being.

social_performance_strength.name: Innovation
social_performance_strength.description: These Field Partners embrace technology and innovation to better address the needs of the people they serve.

social_performance_strength.description: The work of most microfinance institutions helps to combat poverty, but these Field Partners do even more.

social_performance_strength.name: Client Voice
social_performance_strength.description: These Field Partners use feedback from the people they serve and adapt their business practices and product offerings to meet their needs.
